Package It.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
It.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Player>
public class Player extends Object implements Comparable<Player>, Serializable
This class represents the Player class of the game.

    • PlayAssistantCard

      public void PlayAssistantCard(int index)
      This method it is used to play the assistant card in the index position within the deck. It saves the value of the card and the number of steps that mother nature can at most make. Removes the card played from the deck.
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of the card to be played.
